attributes.action: Look at getting car makers to conform with UK law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To be able to change Car lightbulbs at the roadside instead of have to go to main dealer to change,which are none are open 24/7 which they should be if this law requires these bulbs to conform UK law requiring all headlight sidelight indicator lights work at all times if not a fine is issued, this is why car bulbs should be able to be change there and then Easy
